NEWS

[December 21st 2012]

HAPPY END OF THE WORLD (YEAR)
That's it, that's all! Bad Machinery returns on January 7th with the start of part 3 of the Case Of The Unwelcome Visitor. From December 24th-28th, Charlotte and Shauna review the albums of the year, lending their forthright opinions on a raft of gilded releases.

The week after, there is a brief fill-in feature entitled "On This Day In History", which hopefully you will find mildly diverting. I laughed while I was drawing it, perhaps you will too. It's something, you know? Something.

In my absence, maybe you'll enjoy this interview with me for The Beat, or my appearance on Dan Berry's 'Make It Then Tell Everybody'.

It's been a very challenging year, but following Bad Machinery's difficult birth, I feel like we're getting somewhere now, and I couldn't make that happen without my readers. I am grateful to each and every one of you. Winning the British Comic Award for Best Comic was such a fillip, and to be named in lists like this, really makes the doubt of that awkward transition worth it. The first Bad Machinery book is out in March from Oni Press and I couldn't be more pleased with what's been put together. Thank you for making 2012 such a success.
